basics.name: Nevin Kopp
basics.label: Robotics Engineer
basics.summary: Dedicated and highly motivated Robotics Engineer with a Master's degree in Robotics, equipped with advanced technical expertise in automation, machine learning, and control systems. Passionate about applying cutting-edge research and innovative solutions to real-world industry challenges. Eager to contribute to the development of intelligent systems and robotics technologies that drive efficiency and innovation. Strong problem-solving skills, a collaborative mindset, and a commitment to continuous learning make me a valuable asset to any forward-thinking engineering team.

work.name: University of California, Riverside
work.summary: Provide assistance to professors within various courses. Job duties include: holding office hours, grading assignments, and assisting students with lab experiments

references.name: Professor Roman Chomko
references.reference: Associate Professor of Teaching, Electrical & Computer Engineering Dept @ UCR
